#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Get a Religious Girl to See Past Agnostic or Atheistic Beliefs
#Text=Have you ever had trouble getting a date with someone who is religious because of your views ?
#Text=Showing respect for the person 's beliefs , understanding your differences , and figuring out what you have in common are key when it comes to dating a religious girl .
#Text=In the end , it 's up to you decide whether your spiritual divide is a dealbreaker or something you can live with .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Find a woman of faith you like .
#Text=Remember people with religious faith vary as much as atheists and agnostics .
#Text=Find one who has the characteristics you 're looking for in a girlfriend and would consider you as a boyfriend .
#Text=Remember while many such women would consider dating a person outside her faith , others would not -- or cannot .
#Text=Show respect for her beliefs .
#Text=This does n't mean attending religious services or converting .
#Text=You just have to make sure that they know that you are accepting of her faith .
#Text=Do not demand or ask her to do things outside of her religious faith .
#Text=Respect and understand cultural , family , or community differences .
#Text=For some girls and women , dating outside the community can be extremely difficult and threatening to her family , friends , and house of worship .
#Text=If she is an immigrant or first-generation citizen , this is especially true .
#Text=Be sensitive to the fact girls and women will often encounter a lot of resistance .
#Text=This may even mean accepting a chaperone on a date , meeting only at school , or being formally approved by the family members .
#Text=Serve the community .
#Text=Community service is a key part of nearly all religions .
#Text=She may be satisfied knowing that you follow the moral codes of her religion , even if you do not believe exactly in what she believes in .
#Text=Anyway , it 's a good thing to do anyway .
#Text=Be incredibly kind to her .
#Text=Treat her with respect .
#Text=This is obviously a key part of getting anyone to like you , of any belief .
#Text=Be patient .
#Text=It may take time to convince a religious woman that you are honest in your intentions and sincere in your tolerance , so take your time .
#Text=Know when to decide if religion is a deal-breaking issue .
#Text=If you go beyond casual boyfriend and girlfriend relationships , realize that issues of faith can become more serious -- or not .
#Text=When considering marriage or civil union , the issue of faith becomes increasingly more important as you may start a family .
#Text=Sometimes , this becomes truly a problem , and marriage cannot be a viable option .
#Text=But not always , as families sometimes blend beliefs .
#Text=In either case , it has to be a joint decision by the couple .
#Text=Seek marital counseling if such problems become too much .
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you are atheist or agnostic , be respectful of those who have faith in religion .
#Text=It might not be your belief , but be tolerant of others .
#Text=If you are interested in the basic tenets on her faith , do some quick Wikipedia research on key figures , deities , and other various beliefs in her religion .
#Text=Most people like to have relationships with people they have things in common with .
#Text=There is no point in having a relationship with someone who thinks completely differently than you .
#Text=Think about it and admit it .
#Text=One of you thinks that the other is completely wrong .
#Text=If there is such a gap in your way of thinking , then it 's probably not a good idea to pursue a " relationship " that has a huge chance of not working out .

#Text=Statements like , " Are n't Christians ( or whatever religion she is)supposed to be kind to all people , even those who do n't share your beliefs ? " can be helpful if the girl is rude to you about religion .
#Text=But realize it 's not going to help you if you 're a jerk , and then tell her not to be .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't lie to her .
#Text=You 'll compromise your integrity in your beliefs , and if she realizes you are faking interest in her religion , she 'll probably dump you .
#Text=Do n't convert unless you honestly feel this is the choice for you .
#Text=If she is sincere in her beliefs , she probably wo n't really be happy in the long term with anyone who does not share them .
#Text=Are you more interested in making her happy , or in trying to make yourself happy ?
